name: Visual Show Automation Project
summary: A VSA file is an animatronics choreography project created by Brookshire Software Visual Show Automation. It contains a set of timeline-organized events used to automatically control one or more animatronic, lighting, audio, or video devices. Primarily, VSA files are used to control devices during audiovisual performances, shows, and other productions.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

android.display_name: Referenced and used by various VetaSoft video games

ios.display_name: Referenced and used by various VetaSoft video games
